description: Wondering how to cook Brussels sprouts? Try them roasted, then stirred through pasta with chilli, garlic and parmesan. The family will love it.
keywords: Pasta,Brussels sprout,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Budget,Peanut free,Jul 2021
name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 long red chilli, deseeded, finely chopped
0.25 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 240°C/220°C fanforced. Place sprouts on a baking paper-lined baking tray. Drizzle with 2 tbs oil. Season. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden and tender.
Meanwhile, cook pasta in a large saucepan of boiling water according to packet instructions. Drain, reserving 2 tbs cooking liquid. Return pasta to pan.
Heat remaining oil in a large frying pan over mediumhigh heat. Cook garlic and chilli, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant. Add sprouts, pasta and reserved cooking liquid. Toss to coat.
Prepare salad according to packet instructions. Top pasta with parsley and parmesan, then serve with salad.
